Today we pumped the coin “ARCH” on MEXC exchange and hit a peak gain of 659% (with a true peak gain for you members of 159%).

Guys, today we saw our pump hijacked by what we call “pump trackers”. These are people who study the exchange and make a guess as to which coin we will pump. 99% of the time they guess wrong, but today they got lucky and as you can see on the chart, purchased our coin 1 minute before the pump began. 

This took 50% of the liquidity out the coin straight away and caused the price to reach nearly 500% before you even got the coin name. Therefore, gains for you members were capped at just 159x (2.5x). Of course, profit is profit and congratulations to those of you who doubled your money today, but for those who anticipated higher gains we apologise. 

It is EXTREMELY rare for this to happen, and we can guarantee we’ll be back next week with a completely fair and strong pump for all of you. 

Congratulations all. Enjoy your earnings, and the rest of your weekend. 

We’ll see you next week for another pump on MEXC. 

Best,
Your CPC Team 📈

This is the CEO of CPC. I wanted to personally write todays analysis.

Volume today was fairly weak, which caused this lower % gain than usual. We have a few reasons why this might’ve happened, and it’s likely it was a combination of all of them: 

1. Sending the coin name as a picture: some members have poorer wifi connections than others, and images can take a while to load for weaker connections. Some members who received the coin name late may not have bought as they thought they were too late, massively negatively impacting the total volume. We should’ve foreseen such a consequence.

2. Someone, or multiple people guessed the coin around 15 minutes before the pump: they did this after our message about the 2 pairings (USDT and USDD). By process of elimination, they were able to make an educated guesses at the coin name. You can see a mini spike around 15 minutes before the pump so evidence of this is clear. We didn’t stop the pump because we didn’t think it would have a great impact, but maybe it did. Again, we accept full responsibility for this mistake.

It seems strange to dwell on the negatives when we still had a successful pump with a positive peak gain of nearly 600%. But I know what we are capable of delivering and this is sub standard. Although still profitable, and a pretty damn good return, due to our usual highs (and expected 1500% gains) some members maybe have bought near the peak and not made profit today. 

I’m not going to put blame elsewhere. The reasons above were entirely our teams fault. From the entire team, we truly apologise to our members today. It’s so rare we ever let you down, but today we did. I can say with 100% integrity we have learnt from today and are stronger because of it. 

I will make it our sole mission to bring you a 1000%+ strong pump next week. You have my absolute word, we will bounce back from today and hit the highs we’ve been used to for so long. 

Once more, I apologize to our entire community for the mistakes on our end, and Congratulations to those who took profit. 

WE WILL BE BACK NEXT WEEK AND WE WILL NOT TAKE LESS THAN 1000%.

Best regards,
Your CEO of CPC 📈

📚 HOW TO BUY & SELL ON POLONIEX 📚

1️⃣ On the Poloniex App or the website, go to ‘Trade’ (if using the website, then click 'Spot')
 
2️⃣ Hit the 3 parallel lines in the top left corner to open coin search (or the top left corner coin pair if using the website). Make sure you search in the USD, then USDT search field (just USDT if using website).
 
3️⃣ Once you’ve found the coin, change the dropdown from ‘Limit’ to ‘Market’. This allows you to buy really quickly at the best possible price using Market Buy. 
 
4️⃣ Choose 25-100% to decide what % of your USDT you want to invest (the more you invest, the high the returns) and hit BUY! If your full buy order doesn't go through, follow this step again. Sometimes the price will've changed as you're buying so only part of your buy goes through.
 
5️⃣ When you are satisfied with your profit (usually after 1-3 minutes whilst our pump attracts outside investors) SELL for profit using LIMIT SELL. Rapid price fluctuations are common during pumps, and if you use ‘Market’ sell you risk selling lower than you want to. 

To sell using 'Limit': Click 'Sell' --> change the option from 'Market' to ‘Limit’ --> quickly type in the price you wish to sell at, then hit 'Sell [COIN NAME]'. For example, if you bought at 0.01 and you want 1000% gains, you should enter 0.1 as your sell price. When the price reaches 0.1 your sell order will be filled.

📚 HOW TO SELL ON HOTBIT 📚
￼

1) Set your Sell Price
 
Click the top right price section, circled in green, to set your selling price. This means your sell order is just below market price and ensures your order will go through. 
 
2) Complete the Sell Order
 
Select 100% and click ‘SELL [COIN NAME]’. Again, if your sell order doesn’t go through quickly this is because the price has already changed past your sell order. Cancel it and create a new one.

📚 HOW TO BUY ON HOTBIT 📚

PRACTICE THIS PROCESS BEFORE THE PUMP IF YOU ARE NEW TO HOTBIT!
 
1) Search for the coin
 
Go to ‘exchange’ or ‘trade’ if you’re using the Hotbit app. Click the 3 lines in the top left corner, then select ‘Global’. Search for the coin in Global only.
 
2) Set your Buy Price
 
Click the top right price section, circled in red, to set your buying price. This ensures you are buying just above market price, so your order is more likely to go through. If the order is not completed, just cancel it and add a new one.
 
2) Complete the Buy Order
 
Select the % of your USDT you want to invest (25-100%) and simply click ‘BUY [COIN NAME]’ to make your buy order.
If any of the links above don’t open for you, message us and we’ll send them to you directly

📚 HOW TO SELL ON HOTBIT 📚

1) Set your Sell Price 

Click the top right price section, circled in green, to set your selling price. This ensures you are selling above market price and gain profits.

2) Complete the Sell Order

Select 100% and click ‘SELL [COIN NAME]’. Again, if your sell order doesn’t go through quickly this is because the price has already changed past your sell order. Cancel it and create a new one.

📚 HOW TO BUY ON HOTBIT 📚

PRACTICE THIS PROCESS BEFORE THE PUMP IF YOU ARE NEW TO HOTBIT!

1) Search for the coin 

Go to ‘exchange’ or ‘trade’ if you’re using the Hotbit app. Click the 3 lines in the top left corner, then select ‘Global’. Search for the coin in Global only.

2) Set your Buy Price 

Click the top right price section, circled in red, to set your buying price. This ensures you are buying just above market price, so your order is more likely to go through. If the order is not completed, just cancel it and add a new one.

2) Complete the Buy Order

Select the % of your USDT you want to invest (25-100%) and simply click ‘BUY [COIN NAME]’ to make your buy order.

📚 HOW TO SELL ON HOTBIT 📚

1) Set your Sell Price 

Click the top right price section, circled in green, to set your selling price. This ensures you are selling above market price and gain profits.

2) Complete the Sell Order

Select 100% and click ‘SELL [COIN NAME]’. Again, if your sell order doesn’t go through quickly this is because the price has already changed past your sell order. Cancel it and create a new one.

📚 HOW TO BUY ON HOTBIT 📚

PRACTICE THIS PROCESS BEFORE THE PUMP IF YOU ARE NEW TO HOTBIT!

1) Search for the coin 

Go to ‘exchange’ or ‘trade’ if you’re using the Hotbit app. Click the 3 lines in the top left corner, then select ‘Global’. Search for the coin in Global only.

2) Set your Buy Price 

Click the top right price section, circled in red, to set your buying price. This ensures you are buying just above market price, so your order is more likely to go through. If the order is not completed, just cancel it and add a new one.

2) Complete the Buy Order

Select the % of your USDT you want to invest (25-100%) and simply click ‘BUY [COIN NAME]’ to make your buy order.

📚 How to BUY & SELL on Poloniex 

PRACTICE THIS BEFORE ENTERING THE PUMPS IF YOU ARE NEW.

1️⃣ On the Poloniex App or the website, go to ‘Trade’

2️⃣ Hit the 3 parallel lines in the top left corner to open coin search (or the top left corner coin pair if using the website). Make sure you search in the USD, then USDT (just USDT if using website) search field. 

3️⃣ Once you’ve found the coin, change the dropdown from ‘Limit’ to ‘Market’. This allows you to buy really quickly at the best possible price. 

4️⃣ Choose 25-100% to decide what % of your USDT you want to invest (the more you invest, the high the returns) and hit BUY!

5️⃣ Wait a few minutes whilst our pump attracts outside investors, then SELL for profit using LIMIT SELL. Limit Sell means you can choose the price you wish to sell at. Rapid price fluctuations are common during pumps, and if you use ‘Market’ sell you risk selling lower than you want to. 

To sell using this method, change the option to ‘Limit’ and quickly type in the price you wish to sell at. For example, if you bought at 0.01 and you want 1000% gains, you should enter 0.1. When the price reaches 0.1 your sell order will be filled.

📚 HOW TO PREPARE FOR THE POLONIEX PUMPS 📚 

1️⃣ Sign up the Poloniex.com exchange. You can also download the Poloniex app on IOS or Android and use this instead. All our pumps are now likely to be on Poloniex.

You only need to use your email to sign up. You don’t need to complete any security or KYC verification on Poloniex to deposit, trade & withdraw funds. 

2️⃣ Either Buy or Deposit USDT in your Poloniex account for the amount you want to invest. 
 ⁃ To deposit Go to Wallet —> Deposit —> Search ‘USDT’. You can use any network (TRC20, ERC20 or BEP20) to deposit your USDT. 
 ⁃ To buy USDT directly on Poloniex using your credit card, go to ‘Buy Crypto’ (only available on website, not the app).

3️⃣ You are ready to enter the pumps. When the coin name is announced, make sure you are ready to search for the coin on Poloniex in the ‘USD’ search section.  

4️⃣ Once the coin is announced, search for it & buy immediately using ‘Market’ NOT ‘Limit’ to ensure you buy at the best possible price.

5️⃣ Wait a few minutes for the Pump to attract outer investors, then SELL for profit.

📚 How to BUY & SELL on Poloniex 

PRACTICE THIS BEFORE ENTERING THE PUMPS IF YOU ARE NEW.

1️⃣ On the Poloniex App or the website, go to ‘Trade’

2️⃣ Hit the 3 parallel lines in the top left corner to open coin search (or the top left corner coin pair if using the website). Make sure you search in the USD, then USDT (just USDT if using website) search field. 

3️⃣ Once you’ve found the coin, change the dropdown from ‘Limit’ to ‘Market’. This allows you to buy really quickly at the best possible price. 

4️⃣ Choose 25-100% to decide what % of your USDT you want to invest (the more you invest, the high the returns) and hit BUY!

5️⃣ Wait a few minutes whilst our pump attracts outside investors, then SELL for profit using the same method as Buy. However, we do recommend using Limit Sell where you can choose the price you wish to sell at. This is because quick fluctuations are common with pumps. However for beginners you can use Market sell.

📚 IF YOUR BUY / SELL ORDER ISNT GOING THROUGH 📚

The pumps happen very fast. If your sell / buy order isn’t going through, it is because the price has already changed during the time it took for you to place your order.

Cancel it and place a new one at a new price. If you wait, the order may never go through. You might have to do this a few times, this is just what it takes to be in a pump. You must learn and execute the pumps well in order to profit. 

For example, if you attempt to buy or sell your coins at the current market price. By the time your order is in, the price is likely to have changed. Use your own strategy to buy above market price and sell below market price to ensure your order goes through.

React quickly, study & learn from the pumps and you’ll make profit.
